content.rendered:
Director of Inside Sales – Call Center Operations | Tulsa, OK Job Description:
  • Professional, driven individual to manage the sales department of a call center
  • Will manage 15-30 appointment setters and inside sales reps as they generate leads and sales for a full-service marketing firm specializing in attorneys.  Services include: search engine optimization, web design & development, and online video marketing.
Responsibilities:
  • Manage sales department
  • Manage 15-30 appointment setters & inside sales reps
Requirements:
  • 5 + years sales experience, preferably inside sales
  • Call center experience
  • Professional demeanor and communication
  • Military background is a plus
Compensation – DOE
